original: Ergardt, Frans Olén Eliasson, komminister, Varberg, f. 4/10/00 i Fjällbacka, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. G. 30 m. Brita Elisabet Simonsson. Barn: Hans f. 31, Ingegerd 33, Jan 36, Kerstin 40. — Stud:ex. i Lund 22, teol. fil. ex. 23, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Gbgs stift 25. Kommin. i Istorp 28, i Varberg sed. 37, las :pred. sed. 37, pred. v. sjuk- o. ålderd:hemm. Östergården sed. 37. V. ordf. i bar-nav:ndn sed. 45, ordf. i Varbergs kyr-kogårdsnd sed. 44, v. ordf. i Varbergs diakonifören. sed. 38, ordf. i Varbergs kyrkl. ungd :krets sed. 39, led. av styr. f. stift. Morgonsol sed. 42. Hobbies: fiske o, motorbåtsport.
translated: Ergardt, Frans Olén Eliasson, parish priest, Varberg, born on October 4, 1900 in Fjällbacka, Gothenburg and Bohuslän. Married for the first time in 1930 to Brita Elisabet Simonsson. They had four children; Hans born in 1931, Ingegerd born in 1933, Jan born in 1936, and Kerstin born in 1940. Frans completed his high school education in Lund in 1922. He then obtained a degree in theology in 1923 and a master's degree in theology in 1925. He completed practical theological training and was ordained as a priest in the Gothenburg diocese in 1925. Frans served as a parish priest in Istorp from 1928 to 1937, in Varberg from 1937, as well as serving as chaplain in addition to his other duties. He also served as a preacher at nursing homes for the elderly, including Östergården since 1937. Frans was the Vice Chairman of the Children's welfare board from 1945, the Chairman of Varberg's cemetery board from 1944, and also served as Vice Chairman of the Varberg Diaconal Association starting in 1938. He was Chairman of Varberg's Church Youth Group from 1939 and also served as a member of the Board of Directors for the Morgonsol Foundation from 1942. Frans enjoyed fishing and motorboat sports as hobbies.
